title: Viviana Zelizer on Money and Intimacy
description: Viviana Zelizer, Princeton University sociologist, talks about the ideas in her new book, The Purchase of Intimacy. Does money ruin intimacy? Does intimacy ruin our commercial transactions? Zelizer and host Russ Roberts have a lively conversation on the sometimes contentious border between economics and sociology.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
